hero.title: Hefny Digital Solutions
hero.description: No page builders or WordPress. We offer 100% hand-coded websites with superior results starting at $175/mo as well as Google Ads and SEO services.

mobileFirstDesign.title: MOBILE FIRST DESIGN
mobileFirstDesign.description: We start building your site for mobile devices first making sure the code is as lean and optimized with no bloated waste and makes the site even more responsive.

fullyResponsive.title: FULLY RESPONSIVE
fullyResponsive.description: Your website will fit all mobile screens sizes, tablets, and desktop sizes so visitors can access your site from anywhere and see a beautiful site no matter the screen size.

optimizedPageSpeed.title: OPTIMIZED PAGE SPEED
optimizedPageSpeed.description: If your site takes more than 3 seconds to load you can lose up to 50% your traffic because it took too long. Our sites load 1 second or less ensuring everyone that visits your site reaches it.

seoServices.title: SEO SERVICES
seoServices.description: We have an in-house SEO specialist who understands local SEO and how to rank in your local market with plenty of case studies to show results and monthly reports.

googlePpcAds.title: GOOGLE PPC ADS
googlePpcAds.description: We also offer Pay-Per-Click Google ads creation and management with our Google Ads expert who can create effective ad campaigns to maximize your ROI.

basedAcrossThreeCountries.title: BASED ACROSS THREE COUNTRIES
basedAcrossThreeCountries.description: We are mostly based in Canada, UAE and Egypt. We have developers working around the clock.

features.pricing: WEBSITES STARTING AT $0 DOWN AND $175 PER MONTH
features.description: We offer $0 down for a standard 5 page small business website. If you need more than that then we have to do custom pricing based on the scope of work, number of additional pages, and time involved. <bold>12 month minimum contract</bold>. Includes design, development, hosting, unlimited edits, 24/7 support, and lifetime updates.

items.title: 100% SECURE
items.description: Our sites use the latest authentication and authorization best practices to make sure you and whoever visits your site are secure.

items.title: CUSTOM DESIGNED
items.description: Our designs are made by an in-house design team, which allows us to make anything we want.

items.title: 100 PAGESPEED SCORES
items.description: Our sites have zero bloat, zero waste, and built with purpose so we get perfect 98-100/100 speed scores with Google.

items.title: MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
items.description: If we can't design something you like, you get your money back and the contract is cancelled. We stand by our work.

items.title: UNMATCHED SUPPORT
items.description: Call or text us anytime, no phone trees or robots. When you call us you get me - the owner and developer.

items.title: WE KNOW SEO
items.description: No snake oil, no tricks, no lies. We explain very clearly what SEO is, how it works, and what we can do to get you ranking.

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.examplesTitle: What We Can Do For You
portfolio.description: We're currently working on exciting projects that showcase our expertise in web development, mobile apps, and e-commerce solutions. Check back soon to see our latest work!

example1.title: E-commerce Platform
example1.description: A hypothetical e-commerce solution showcasing our capabilities:

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Project?
cta.description: We're excited to bring your ideas to life. Let's discuss your project and create something amazing together.

aboutPage.title: ABOUT US
aboutPage.tagline: WE MAKE WEBSITES WITH PURPOSE & INTENT

description.part1: At Hefny Digital, we specialize in creating purposeful and impactful websites for businesses that want to make a lasting impression online. Our approach combines modern design principles with robust functionality to deliver websites that not only look great but also drive results.
description.part2: What sets us apart is our commitment to understanding each client's unique needs. We've found that many businesses struggle with either outdated websites that don't reflect their current brand or expensive solutions that don't deliver the expected value. That's where we come in â€“ offering professional, custom web development solutions that align with your business goals and budget.
description.part3: Since our establishment, we've been helping businesses transform their online presence with websites that are beautiful, functional, and purpose-built for success. Our team brings together technical expertise and creative vision to create digital experiences that truly represent your brand and connect with your audience.

process.title: OUR WORKING PROCESS
process.subtitle: WE TAKE CARE OF EVERYTHING
process.description: After a contract is signed we send a small questionnaire about your business and what you offer, then we expand on that content and write the entire site's content for you, create the design, get approval, then we build. Generally takes 2-3 weeks from start to finish.

steps.title: COMPLETE QUESTIONNAIRE
steps.description: We send you an email with less than 10 questions about you business, services, what sets you apart, etc and we do all the rest.

steps.title: DESIGN APPROVAL
steps.description: We then do a video screen share showing you the first draft and make any changes you want to make sure you're 100% satisfied.

steps.title: DEVELOPMENT
steps.description: Once approved, we can start coding the site out and setting everything up. We will send a demo link to view before we launch and go live.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Hefny Digital Solutions was founded by brothers Mohamed and Amr Hefny, combining their expertise in technology and business to deliver cutting-edge digital solutions.

mohamed.bio: Mohamed Hefny brings extensive expertise to Hefny Digital Solutions. A graduate of Concordia University, Mohamed has worked with industry giants like Morgan Stanley and Amazon, honing his skills in software development and cloud technologies. His experience drives our technical innovation and ensures we deliver top-tier solutions to our clients.

amr.bio: Amr Hefny complements the technical prowess of Hefny Digital Solutions with his sharp business acumen. His strategic insights and client-focused approach ensure that our solutions not only meet technical requirements but also drive business growth and success for our clients.

contact.title: Call or Message us
contact.subtitle: We're here to support your business growth. Whether you have a quick question or you're ready to start your journey with us, our team is just a call or message away.
contact.name: Your name*
contact.terms: *WE DON'T ACCEPT SEO, LINK-BUILDING, OR GUEST POSTING SERVICE OFFERS.

mohamed.name: Mohamed Hefny
mohamed.description: Expert in scaling businesses through digital exposure. Former Amazon and Morgan Stanley employee.
